data.text:
We are among very few airlines to operate the ultramodern Boeing 787 dream-liner and Airbus A350.
The African giant Ethiopian Airlines is one of high-profile 787 and A350 operator.The airline operates 14 A350-900s,19 787-8s,& seven 787-9s.  
Simple flying
https://t.co/UknnShe1Xo https://t.co/Dlno9veDeg

data.text:

 #reunitingfamilies  #Itisgoodtobeback #FlyEthiopian 
Video credit: Charlotte Nambadja https://t.co/8qroGWiOxi

Happy Ethiopian New Year! 
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/MpiOdDm77N

@millianoxx Dear @millianoxx, we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered as this is an exception to the high standard of service that we strive to give to our esteemed customers. Kindly DM us the details of the case so that we can look into it. Regards,

@KoBulawayoo Dear @KoBulawayoo, Thank you for sharing.

Thank you for sharing your Et moments Abush Mohammed Please send us your pictures,

#Itisgoodtobeback #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/DT9ZZR7PZS

We would not leave anything to the imagination when it comes to ensuring your safety and comfort.
#Flyethiopian  #flywithconfidence https://t.co/Omc0ANqUn3

urls.title: Apply for Ethiopian eVISA Online | Ethiopian E Visa Official Website
urls.description: Ethiopian e-Visa | Apply for Ethiopian e-Visa online and secure your Visa now. Ethiopian e-Visa official website , Learn how to apply for different types of immigrant visas for tourists, students, business travelers and Other Visas. Get your Visa and visit the Land of Origins - Ethiopia. Also, find information about Visa Programs, and how to work in Ethiopia as a foreign worker.

@Steve_Baleba Dear @Steve_Baleba,  You will not be required to bring a Negative RT-PCR SAR-CoV test if only transiting through Ethiopia.

@EthanCarterIV Dear @EthanCarterIV, We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you encountered as this is an exception to the high standard of service that we strive to give to our esteemed customers. Kindly inbox(DM )us the detail so that we can look in to the case.
